readingMnemonic: The smithy where you’re doing the <kanji>tempering</kanji> is pretty fancy, but it’s just a <reading>ren</reading>tal (れん). You haven't sold enough gold to own a smithy as nice as this one yet, so for now, you rent one. It is pretty swanky though, even for a rental.
meaningMnemonic: The <radical>gold</radical> from the <radical>east</radical> needs <kanji>tempering</kanji> before it can be sold. The gold from the east is good, it just needs some tempering before it's entirely presentable. You know, tempering like you'd do in a forge.
